name: Threats
description: This app allows users to connect with others  share images, update profiles, and manage their content
Used Docker to Facilitate containerization, enabling seamless deployment across various environments
Used open-source relational database management system for efficient data storage

name: ExpressL Programming Language
description: This is a custom programming language i made using Typescript.
The Language has conditional, error handling statements and also function calls

name: Music Player
description: This is a music app made during a hackathon securing the first runner-up position.
The app uses Utilizes Redux for efficient state management
It uses React Audio Player for seamless music playback

name: Rawg Game store
description: Used Stripe Api to make game purchases (mock purchases),
used Africas's Talking sms Api to send  messages to users after the purchase was made
This is a hackathon project, The Africa's Talking Api only works in 23 African countries.
